subject: Tennis
French Open (Tennis)
lead_paragraph: Only after a six-hour rain delay did Serena Williams find her composure against Tsvetana Pironkova to win, 5-7, 6-1, 6-1 in the first round at the French Open.
snippet: Only after a six-hour rain delay did Serena Williams find her composure against Tsvetana Pironkova to win, 5-7, 6-1, 6-1 in the first round at the French Open.
